Reviews.Title: Oh I love it..
Reviews.Author: mareleigh
Reviews.Content: But, problem was, it was a used phone and the prior owner did not disclose the fact that there is a short in the phone for charging.. So, I have a great little phone, looks great, sound, texting, imaging.. photographs are fantastic.. And I cannot charge it..  If you buy the phone new.. you will be very pleased, but buying it used .. you take a chance on the sellers lack of total honesty.  Now, the only option is to find another version of the phone that has the same battery size, and buy a new battery..  Good luck..

Reviews.Title: Fair
Reviews.Author: Jean Green
Reviews.Content: I Chose this rating because I didn't like the phone it was smaller than I thought it would be the condition wasn't good I would say fair

Reviews.Title: Question
Reviews.Author: Eveline
Reviews.Content: Does it have 2 (two) or 1 (one) camera. And does it have a qwerty keyboard or touchscreen display. Thank you.
